Robert Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Stephen Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says. "Being mean was what made him a celebrity. But Stephen Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are already celebrities. They have their cultural equity to protect." For Toby Young , it's no accident that

Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible George W. Bushial candidate himself. Colin Powell said he questioned Sen. John McCain 's judgment in picking Gov.
